TopicTitle: [0.22] B9 Aerospace Pack / R4.0c / New pods, IVAs, engines, fuselages & structures

Articles.Content:
I am also having troubble with the beautifull M27 Cockpit in 0.20.

I cannot see the Kerbal Pictures in the bottom right so I cant IVA nor EVA. I also cannot click on the hatch.

In the Crew Manifest I see the Cockpit is manned.

I tested this with just the cockpit on the launchpad.

Is it just me? Maybe something went wrong while coping files from my 0.19 installation?

Hmm I don't know how you have it installed?

The old way or the new way? If you haven't gone in and edited all the parts then you will most certainly be talking about the old way. Which it may or may not actually function correctly installed that way.

I used the 2.0 updater batch script posted by Ph34rb0t here. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/31273-0-20-Part-cfg-Updater

There is a platform independent updater too for you folks on Mac and Linux. It requires Python. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/31972-Platform-Independent-0-20-Part-cfg-Updater

If that seems like a bridge too far, then just hang out a few days and this will be updated for a much smoother experience. Seems like the update is not too far off.

codiak you most likely forgot to copy the internals folders.

There is no need to convert old addon to the new file format. They works fine in their old folders and many people will break more thing while trying to convert.
Another day of futile F5's....
hehe i only check ever 6 hours so it doesnt disappoint me xD
As soon as this updates, I am going to include this pack in my story series.

Another day of futile F5's....

Yall think it might help if we like...brand a bunny with B9 logo....then kills it?

we could totally paint it green too
At least a day of work still, we have decided we need some more content.
Can't argue with that. Like I said, I've watched the B9 pack from the very very beginning, it's worth the wait. Take your time bac9, this is one of the most impressive packs that I've seen.

At least a day of work still, we have decided we need some more content.

*crosses fingers for larger cargo bay's*

cylindrical MK4 for space instead of airplanes

one can dream

and keep up the amazing work!

Why S2 Fuselage System - Hypersonic Cockpit don't have lights? Open and closed Cockpit lights!

I miss it...

Seams like a missing part of the puzzle...
Bac9- Please do not hold the pack back for too long! We are dying out here, waiting for it.
Hehe bac9 can hold it all he wants its been a month since this update was announced (but i wanna play with it to)

we have decided we need some more content.

Glorious.

I find it hard to play .20 in anticipation for r2.6 parts.

Glorious.

I find it hard to play .20 in anticipation for r2.6 parts.

Meh; I'm having fun experimenting with chairs and stuff. I can wait patiently....ish.
*hopes for Mk4 Cockpit* Can't wait to build a B52 for spaceplane launching. Or maybe an X-15 style spit out the back! Or satellite base cruise missile decoupler pylons I can pair with remotetech!

I've been collecting a few other mods with a similarly clean look while I wait for 2.6. LackLusterLabs, TriHexagonal Struts, Spherical Tanks, Fatman engines...

I intend to make many glorious designs and fail spectacularly at assembling them in space.

codiak you most likely forgot to copy the internals folders.

There is no need to convert old addon to the new file format. They works fine in their old folders and many people will break more thing while trying to convert.

You where right. Thanks!

Is there any hope for HL Passenger module? It could carry a lot of kerbals with its size. Also it would be nice to have HL rear part without ramp, because SSTO based on HL parts often dont need it.

Nice job guys anyway, can't wait for R2.6.

...It would be nice to have HL rear part without ramp, because SSTO based on HL parts often dont need it...

Or you can forget about the ramp and use the narrow rear part...

Also it would be nice to have HL rear part without ramp, because SSTO based on HL parts often dont need it.

You know you could just not use the rear ramp xD but i find it useful for loading rovers and such
Congrats bac9 for this baby hitting 100 pages!

Congrats bac9 for this baby hitting 100 pages!

I would say technically 95 pages, 5 full pages of " hitting f5" doesn't really count.
Still hitting f5...
Quit posting when you hit it, it makes me look because there's a new post!!

I'm very impressed with this pack. However, the wings and fuselage don't like to play ball together. The Hienlein (or whatever it's called) SSTO spaceplane's wings love to explode after being in timewarp, or sometimes just at random.

Also, some of the cockpits prove impossible to actually see directly out of. Usually just staring at a non-functional MFD. Nice to look out of, but fairly useless.
